Parse a query string

Source: R/aaa.R
query_parser.Rd

This function facilitates the parsing of querystrings, either from the URL or a POST or PUT body with Content-Type set to application/x-www-form-urlencoded.

Usage

query_parser(query = NULL, delim = NULL)

Arguments

query

The query as a single string

delim

Optional delimiter of array values. If omitted it is expected that arrays are provided in exploded form (e.g. arg1=3&arg1=7)

Value

A named list giving the keys and values of the query. Values fron the same key are combined if given multiple times

Examples

# Using delimiter to provide array
query_parser("?name=Thomas+Lin+Pedersen&numbers=1%202%203", delim = " ")
#> $name
#> [1] "Thomas Lin Pedersen"
#> 
#> $numbers
#> [1] "1" "2" "3"
#> 

# No delimiter (exploded form)
query_parser("?name=Thomas%20Lin%20Pedersen&numbers=1&numbers=2&numbers=3")
#> $name
#> [1] "Thomas Lin Pedersen"
#> 
#> $numbers
#> [1] "1" "2" "3"
#>
